column5: Am starting to plan our early June, 2004 trip to Canada and I need any info and or recomendations or warnings about the following Lodges and or Lakes....generally need to know about the number and size of fish...genearally walleyes as well as the lodge: McIntosh Lodge on Canyon Lake, 15 miles N. of Vermillion Bay OR Skyline Lodge on Florence Lake at Perault Falls Any info or opinions would be greatly appreciated.
Anybody been to Skyline Lodge on Florence Lake? They advertise as only camp on the lake. Wondered about the quality of fishing--especially walleye. Thanks.
